column3: “It's 12:40P.M., and I'm about to make a bold and daring move....I've just loaded my 43 year old pipe with a beautiful piece of BlackWater flower, and will give you a detailed appraisal of it's effects on this 60 year old mind and body. What the hell...it's after noon.  Before I fire up the bowl, here's a description of the flower top: Big, dense, covered with orange hair and huge crystals.  Very impressive! Ok...here...”

“3rd Place Indica in 2014 Cannabis Cup, 
This potent strain fu**ing delivers! 
Definitely more of a evening, late night medicine.
Not one to really deliver a creative mind, more of a relaxed state.
IF you EVER get an opportunity to get ahold of authentic Blackwater, 
I truly recommend the experience! 
4.5/5”

“I was fortunate enough to find  Blackwater at my local dispensary today. My budtender recommended it to me after I mentioned I prefer an Indica that packs a punch.
This bud has lots of crystals on the leaves, some purple coloration and a lot of orange hairs, which is nice to see.
The flavour I find to be sort of citrusy, sort of earthy, and quite smooth.
The effects are quick to take hold, I've had about 3 tokes from...”

“I recieved a Blackwater clone from a fellow grower in 2014. The Blackwater strain matures @ around 8 weeks give or take a few days providing there was no lock up due to environmental/nutritional instability. Blackwater is a slow growing low yielding strain when grown indoors. I have yet to experiment with it outdoors. The smoke is rich and smooth with an unmistakable berry like flavor and long lingering aroma. The po...”
“Pure indica that cuts through any anxiety. Too much will knock you on your ass.”

“Migraine pain comin on; nausea 6 when I medicated round 2200 or so. Takes bout 5-10 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (a must for me). Body high perfect while it lasted. Head high not strong enough to make me sleepy which is really weird for an Indica. But I may be developing a tolerance also. Still awesome, sweet taste. 2 hours later head & body high have worn off. Again, maybe due to my ne...”
“some great tasting indica don't plan on doing anything this green packs a huge punch but its a great long lasting high straight to the dome”

“Every time I've tried to write a review after vaping Blackwater, I either forget, get distracted or fall asleep😂.  Kills nerve pain (hard to do), crushes insomnia with sleep, doesn't give bad munchies & stops panic attacks.  I always forget what I'm talking about mid-sentence after Blackwater.  TKO &Thank you Urban Greenhouse!!! Amazing indica!!”

“FIre Fire Fireeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
WoW There has been a lot spoken for this strain and it held up its part of the DEAL!!! FIRE”

“Second time around with this strain I picked up some shatter for $12.50 a half gram. It's 11:45pm & I have been trying to medicate since 8pm, but some weird & stressful stuff prevented me from doing so. 
My blood pressure was so high then I immediately went for blackwater.
Just one dab and my pain was gone, my appetites back, and I'm having a hard time fighting off the sandman.
The flavor is similar to most kush stra...”
“best weed i have smoked in a long time got super high, great flavor”
“Just got this amazing tasting concentrate  (PHO wax) of the Blackwater OG, incredible stuff! Instant relaxation and euphoric head buzz, giggles and enlightened outlook :)”

“I know why they call it blackwater OG now. This one really took me by surprise. I toked a single bowl in the vaporizer for a moment, not as long as i usually need to to get proper stoned, but did not finish the entire bowl. I felt i had gotten enough, turned off my vape and decided to make some music. Before i knew it, i was high out of my mind. So high that it took me a while to even realize how high i was. And then...”
“Best strain I have ever found. Very potent. Amazing for severe pain, insomnia, anxiety and nausea. Fast high, but also long lasting. Muscle spasms stop within a minute. My favorite strain.”

“Bought it
Took 3 hits
Won 5 games of fortnite solo
Took another hit
Passed out
Best sleep ever”

“This is the second time I have picked up an 1/8 of this strain. This time from a different source and it is just as good as it was last time. Nice big green buds with some red hairs mixed in. There is also a great deal of crystals covering the buds. The high is perfect for after work or evening time. Heavy indica body high that washes pain away and relaxes muscles. With a nice head high that is always relaxing and pu...”
“taking a couple dabs of some blackwater shatter is a good way to make a solid bum groove in your favorite seat. locked and loaded as a muh over here.  good lord”

“Bought it
Took 3 hits
Won 5 games of fortnite solo
Took another hit
Passed out
Best sleep ever”
“Best strain I have ever found. Very potent. Amazing for severe pain, insomnia, anxiety and nausea. Fast high, but also long lasting. Muscle spasms stop within a minute. My favorite strain.”

“This strain is fast becoming a staple in my inventory. This is the third eighth in a row I have purchased. This time from The Greenhouse. I love the heavy indica effects after a hard day's work. And the buds, oh those beautiful dense green nugs with a heavy coating of white.”

“The only reason I got this strain was because of the budtenders recommendation that this is what everybody comes back for" so because it was my first time at that particular dispensary I trusted her judgement. Upon inspecting it looked above average to great
column4: lime green bud with decent trichome covering and uniform orange hairs
column5: nothing special about the smell either
column6: slightly earthy with a hint of OG. However upon ...”"

column3:
“Tried this as a sample and found the effects to be SUPERIOR! I suffer from acute muscle spasms due to a acute back injury- wake up 6 to 7 times a night and was always tired. 
Not only was I surprised by the incredibly spicy aroma and the taste, (oh my word!!!!!!) but for the first time in years I slept for 5 solid hours straight- no muscle spasms to blow me out of bed????
Either they were minor enough for me to sleep...”
“very relaxing, not for beginners. extremely potent!”

“Just picked up this Indica for the first time yesterday and I could not be more happy. Nice big, dense buds with some red hairs mixed in and a nice dusting of crystals covering the entire bud. When smoked you get a smooth but pungent taste with subtle hints berry and pine. This is a great strain for smoking after a hard day's work. It will leave you relaxed,happy, and take away any pain you might have. A couple of mo...”

“This is some beautiful bud I just picked this up yesterday at the Greenhouse in Glendale Az it is sticky and wow it's sparkle is amazing! I also enjoy the taste but most important it gets you really high and helped with my severe back pain! I love this strain great job on this guys grown to perfection!!!!”

“Black Water is great. But I couldn't buy any on  420 because your setup was ridiculous. I was told it would be an hour,  after 2 hours of not even getting inside the door.  No water,  no bathroom.  Never go to The Greenhouse on 420, it sucks,  no matter what The Greenhouse thinks.”

“Relaxed. I do not give a fuck about anything. I really dig the smell. It's almost like a subtle men's cologne. Woodsy and something a little flowery. Lavender, maybe. The high is heady at first but melts into a full-body relaxation. Fantastic strain for anxiety and stress.”

“I love the earthy scent and taste and stress ebbs away.  It eases the pain (from herniated discs) and helps manage the pain.  This is the best strain I have smoked in quite in while when it comes to relieving stress and tension relief and most everyone knows that tension is what makes back pain worse.”

“Blackwater smells like a delightful fruit medley soaked in gasoline and the juice at the bottom of your compost bin, but microdosing this strain seems to have a really great effect on my depression. I am much more calm, peaceful, and my concentration isn't impaired at all. Good Stuff ™”

“I was pleasantly surprised after letting this strain absorb and do its thing.  it is at first subtle, then it unfolds a couple of levels deeper into a mind and body relaxation and serious chair/couch lock.  it truly evolved beyond my first impression after the first 20-30 minutes.”

“I reviewed this strain a while ago and was impressed with its ability to knock out insomnia.  I  was lucky enough to get my hands on some more, and I want to explain what makes it different from most other Indicas.   Blackwater does not have the staggeringly high THC counts you will find in some other  strains.  It seems to have the perfect blend of cannabinoids. and terpenes, to make this strain almost narcotic.  3-...”

“very beautiful  buds, almost a forrest green covered with what looks like sugar there are so many trichromes.  I have what I like to call an absolute immunity to indica's effects, basically I smoke predominantly indica's & have raised my tolerance. Considerably, however Blackwater blew me away.  Upon finishing a bong load I was able to relax and slowly drift to sleep.”

“Blackwater smells like a delightful fruit medley soaked in gasoline and the juice at the bottom of your compost bin, but microdosing this strain seems to have a really great effect on my depression. I am much more calm, peaceful, and my concentration isn't impaired at all. Good Stuff ™”
“Amazing! Cured me of my almost crippling chronic migraines, takes away the pain and the light sensitivity.”
“I haven't smoked in 25 years, so I found this an INCREDIBLY powerful strain. I was pinned to my sofa. Once I eased into it, I was light headed and silly. Slept like a baby with no pain.”

“Grabbed this at new place locally. Was told it was strong.. Holy crap they were not kidding. This is one of the best strains I have ever had. Its up there in my top 3. Bit harsh on the pulls, and its a creeper. One min i was asking how long ago next I played eq for about 12 hours. I didnt notice the time go at all. Recommend highly.”

“Hard hitting strain! It's only been like 30 mins since my first hit and I don't even need another one for a bit. this made me almost cough up lung INSTANTLY! Heavy menthol/diesel was caught in my lungs and burning feeling stayed in my chest. I feel like I sucked on a 94 Honda Civics' tail pipe that is in desperate need of a smog check! The reason I took away a star was cause the burning feeling embeds itself in your ...”

“Don't remember what pain scale was as this strain was a couple of days ago. Nausea has been off the hook lately. Medicated round 2000 or so. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia. Tastes like blackberries. I go big sleepy. It was great. Highly recommend for nighttime/bedtime use! :-)”
“Helps with insomnia. Vaporize 1 hour before bedtime.”

“So this is my second favourite strain ever next to white widow. Excellent for ptsd symptoms and really great for sleep. I can not recommend this enough. I have been splurging for the higher priced stuff as to get good quality grass. But this one is a big time favourite.”

“Best for nighttime use. That being said, this shit is super stoney and gave me the munchies like crazy. Tested at 20%. Good for nausea, cramps, stimulating appetite, and headaches. Like I said suuuper stoney, definitely a strong indica.”
“relajante, una sola dosificacion y el efecto analgesico intenso.”

“Don't remember what pain scale was as this strain was a couple of days ago. Nausea has been off the hook lately. Medicated round 2000 or so. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia. Tastes like blackberries. I go big sleepy. It was great. Highly recommend for nighttime/bedtime use! :-)”

“So this is my second favourite strain ever next to white widow. Excellent for ptsd symptoms and really great for sleep. I can not recommend this enough. I have been splurging for the higher priced stuff as to get good quality grass. But this one is a big time favourite.”
“So far this is my favorite nighttime strain. Really packs a punch and hits pretty quick (about 10-15 min for me). After the initial hit its real mellow and the smell is amazing!!”
“Helps with insomnia. Vaporize 1 hour before bedtime.”

“Blackwater I smoked last night with my wife. I bought a gram at Good Sinse in Fairbanks ak and it measures in at 25.06% thc and 0.06% cbd. I smoked 2 hits off a new silicone pipe we just bought and it hit like a champ and we were knocked out in 20 mins. this is my favorite indica strain by far. I'm glad we have found a good indica. for our wake n bake this morning we have a .05 gram Kali cuah joint we got for 5$ at t...”

“Wow caked up in crystals. Taste of danky suny aroama left in air after bong rip(load).. Not something I keep in my roation for sure go to strain. Now I know the potency this plant has and I really can dig it. Top 5 if quality is good and fresh. Strictly my pov.”

“Best for nighttime use. That being said, this shit is super stoney and gave me the munchies like crazy. Tested at 20%. Good for nausea, cramps, stimulating appetite, and headaches. Like I said suuuper stoney, definitely a strong indica.”

“Wow caked up in crystals. Taste of danky suny aroama left in air after bong rip(load).. Not something I keep in my roation for sure go to strain. Now I know the potency this plant has and I really can dig it. Top 5 if quality is good and fresh. Strictly my pov.”

“Don't remember what pain scale was as this strain was a couple of days ago. Nausea has been off the hook lately. Medicated round 2000 or so. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia. Tastes like blackberries. I go big sleepy. It was great. Highly recommend for nighttime/bedtime use! :-)”

“I have been using this one for awhile now. It is one of my more preferred indicas. It has a very mellow tea and earth flavor that isnt great but isnt bad or overpowering. 

It has the traditional indica head high and it will absolutely creep up on you so take your time with it. I feel control of my thoughts start to slightly slip away  into the water " so this strain is better suited for bedtime or when you are done...”"
“I haven't smoked in 25 years, so I found this an INCREDIBLY powerful strain. I was pinned to my sofa. Once I eased into it, I was light headed and silly. Slept like a baby with no pain.”

“It's fine, it's just not spectacular. Lot of other great kushes and hybrids. If this works for you, you should feel relaxed, sorta warm, at ease. Maybe good for a social setting where nerves are an issue. I'd also recommend to take at night as a sleep aid. One thing I liked was how smooth this was; I hit it pretty hard with almost zero cough. Again, if you have blackwater, you'll enjoy it. Beginners and light smokers...”
“I have almost an immunity to the sleepy effects of any indica because of my tolerance, I can rely on this strain for insomnia relief.  Blackwater is almost purple/grape tasting.”

“I haven't got a proper diagnosis of IBS, but I haven't had diarrhea in 3 days since I've been smoking this. if you have any stomach issues, I hope you give this one a try. 
you're definitely spacey and forget what you're doing half the time. you're body feels extremely heavy and all you want to do is sleep. I also have had the best sleep of my life on this strain AND I am pain free! my neck doesn't hurt from the whip...”
“This had such a fantastically blissful blast off" euphoric high
“unbelievable strength for pain, the best I have tried so far. I bought it at a cannabis event for $5 a gram and it is the best $5 grab I've ever spent.”

“This strain is extremely potent and fast acting. The effect is very pronounced in the head with moderate body. I did not find this strain to be pain releiving, and it not a medicine I'd use if I needed to get stuff (anything) done. This is definitely a night time or rainy day strain.”

“Definetly a great solid Indica. Hungry, Happy, Horny, so who could complain. Also excellent at lifting my mood and making me laugh. Very smooth smoke with a piney - lemony like taste but definetly a solid go to Indica & a good strain to keep in the medicine cabinet for depression,  anxiety, mood, & a good old laugh.”

“It's not her it's me. I have PTSD. And as much as I love how relaxed my body feels. I can't stand the paranoia on it. She makes me think about too much. If you struggle with being in your head too much and have PTSD. This isn't a strain for you. My suggestion is to take a pinch of it in your vape or your blunt. And smoke maybe two hits depending on how low of a tolerance you have for THC. You don't need a lot of this...”

“Def a heavy hitter..rolled up an L of some and could feel the high creep it on the way to work..that was at 7...it's 1 o'clock and I'm still feeling it...mellow mood..could sit here all day and do nothing at all, and that would be okay with me.”
“pretty stony, the price is decent too. I have”

“I loved this strain for a multitude of purposes. I'm an every day smoker so I was using heavily during the day, but I wouldn't recommend that for most. lol. some of the best sleep I have ever had. I've noticed a decrease in my anxiety and less depressing episodes.”

“I loved this strain for a multitude of purposes. I'm an every day smoker so I was using heavily during the day, but I wouldn't recommend that for most. lol. some of the best sleep I have ever had. I've noticed a decrease in my anxiety and less depressing episodes.”
“This had such a fantastically blissful blast off" euphoric high
“This strain is ok . It's definitely calms and relaxs you . Takes my fiance's anxiety away like she never had it . But not all that”

“This is one of the first three strains I got from a dispensary in Jersey after getting my card in the mail that day. I got it for anxiety, and needless to say I was eager to try it when I got home. I loaded the vaporizer once and I was out like a light. Great strain. Highly recommend.”

“I recently picked up some AAAA Blackwater from my dispensary and I have to give it a solid 5.3/5. The smoke wasn't harsh and the high settles behind the eyes about 8secs after a hit. This is definitely an evening/night time strain. I made the mistake of hitting a bowl before my 8 am class and I turned into a luke warm honey bun for the rest of the day”

“This is one of the strongest Indica strains that I have tried. 
I was definitely impressed. 
I love it”
“If you’re looking to relax and chill for the remainder of the day or night this is the perfect strain. With the hints of purple in the buds you know you’re in for a great smoke.”
“Very stoney strain. Definite couch lock, relaxing, nice smoke to relieve stress and pain, but don't expect to get much done for a couple hours. Thanks to TCC in Mesa for another quality medication.”

“I recently picked up some AAAA Blackwater from my dispensary and I have to give it a solid 5.3/5. The smoke wasn't harsh and the high settles behind the eyes about 8secs after a hit. This is definitely an evening/night time strain. I made the mistake of hitting a bowl before my 8 am class and I turned into a luke warm honey bun for the rest of the day”
“Love this strain! Just got done smoking it and I get high very quickly, it does have a heavy lung feeling too it. It's good for watching anything comical, and can get the munchies”
“This had such a fantastically blissful blast off" euphoric high

“This strain is extremely potent and fast acting. The effect is very pronounced in the head with moderate body. I did not find this strain to be pain releiving, and it not a medicine I'd use if I needed to get stuff (anything) done. This is definitely a night time or rainy day strain.”

“I loved this strain for a multitude of purposes. I'm an every day smoker so I was using heavily during the day, but I wouldn't recommend that for most. lol. some of the best sleep I have ever had. I've noticed a decrease in my anxiety and less depressing episodes.”

“Definitely a night strain. Buds are beautiful with some nice purple coloration and lots of beautiful trichomes. I’m a newbie so do take this lightly, but I loved how it tasted. Smooth taste. I can clearly taste the berries, surprisingly, with a bit of a watermelon hitting me slightly right at the end of the exhale. Helps me sleep like a baby. Definitely recommend it.”
“Very stoney strain. Definite couch lock, relaxing, nice smoke to relieve stress and pain, but don't expect to get much done for a couple hours. Thanks to TCC in Mesa for another quality medication.”

“This strain, in flower and concentrate is pure heaven. The taste reminds me of a combination between cotton candy and the smell of dew outside after a rainstorm.  Both memories combine to give you a nostalgic feel without taking one hit yet. The nugs are soft and fluffy and smell extremely sweet. The smoke is smooth and tasty, With the Effects coming on fairly fast  physically and you feel like you’ve been wrapped up...”

“Definitely a night strain. Buds are beautiful with some nice purple coloration and lots of beautiful trichomes. I’m a newbie so do take this lightly, but I loved how it tasted. Smooth taste. I can clearly taste the berries, surprisingly, with a bit of a watermelon hitting me slightly right at the end of the exhale. Helps me sleep like a baby. Definitely recommend it.”

“Def a heavy hitter..rolled up an L of some and could feel the high creep it on the way to work..that was at 7...it's 1 o'clock and I'm still feeling it...mellow mood..could sit here all day and do nothing at all, and that would be okay with me.”

“This strain, in flower and concentrate is pure heaven. The taste reminds me of a combination between cotton candy and the smell of dew outside after a rainstorm.  Both memories combine to give you a nostalgic feel without taking one hit yet. The nugs are soft and fluffy and smell extremely sweet. The smoke is smooth and tasty, With the Effects coming on fairly fast  physically and you feel like you’ve been wrapped up...”

“WHOA! I’m a heavy indica smoker, and this strain stands the fuck out from the crowd. I recently went through a breakup and usually when I’m heartsick I like to write music, but nothing was happening. I was creatively constipated, lol. I’m smoking this tonight and it feels like I can’t STOP writing music. I don’t know I just needed to jump on here and tell you guys that uplifting and creative doesn’t begin to describe...”
“pretty stony, the price is decent too. I have”
“This had such a fantastically blissful blast off" euphoric high
“Very stoney strain. Definite couch lock, relaxing, nice smoke to relieve stress and pain, but don't expect to get much done for a couple hours. Thanks to TCC in Mesa for another quality medication.”

“Opened up my eighth & smelled a sweet fruity grape scent. Buds were medium to dark green with a ton of trichomes & amber colored pistils covering the bud. Taste i got was a fruity pine. Got an mellow relaxed high which can put you to sleep at the end of the day like a lot of Indica's. The strain may have received the Third Best Indica Strain at the 2014 Los Angeles Cannabis Cup but, i just found it to average because...”
“pretty stony, the price is decent too. I have”

“Really chill smoke, a hella relaxing body high and a mild head buzz. I smoked it in the middle of the day which was definitely a bad idea as I was pretty sleepy for the rest of the day. Quality flavor though and leaves a nice taste in your mouth for awhile after. Also very easy to function on.”
“This had such a fantastically blissful blast off" euphoric high

“This is one of the strongest Indica strains that I have tried. 
I was definitely impressed. 
I love it”
“Very stoney strain. Definite couch lock, relaxing, nice smoke to relieve stress and pain, but don't expect to get much done for a couple hours. Thanks to TCC in Mesa for another quality medication.”

“My personal fave at the moment. Great body high, negates all my pain, can't beat it!”

“My personal fave at the moment. Great body high, negates all my pain, can't beat it!”
“pretty stony, the price is decent too. I have”

“Blackwater is darn tasty strain dispensary's in West Valley,AZ keep setting the bar higher and higher on this strain.Love picking this up taste and flavor's of Coolwater cologne and deep grape juice Tang taste.Love enjoy this strain at night for sleep or to browse the star's and watch F16's-F35's @ night in AZ.
Have not seen bucking UFO's yet :(”
“This is one of the best medical indica strains in NJ right now. Amazing the THC is 29 and I'm a smoker. This is serious..”
“Potent indica strain that is great for smoking at night with a plate of food and a warm bed ready.  Satisfying earthy, woody smell.”

“Def a heavy hitter..rolled up an L of some and could feel the high creep it on the way to work..that was at 7...it's 1 o'clock and I'm still feeling it...mellow mood..could sit here all day and do nothing at all, and that would be okay with me.”

“Really great strain that helped me with relaxing and some lingering pain. A must try if you love Indicas”
“This is one of the best medical indica strains in NJ right now. Amazing the THC is 29 and I'm a smoker. This is serious..”

And smoke maybe two hits depending on how low of a tolerance you have for THC. You don't need a lot of this...”

“Def a heavy hitter..rolled up an L of some and could feel the high creep it on the way to work..that was at 7...it's 1 o'clock and I'm still feeling it...mellow mood..could sit here all day and do nothing at all, and that would be okay with me.”

“I loved this strain for a multitude of purposes. I'm an every day smoker so I was using heavily during the day, but I wouldn't recommend that for most. lol. some of the best sleep I have ever had. I've noticed a decrease in my anxiety and less depressing episodes.”
“Good clean taste and smell (Very sweet and piney, a little skunky).  An even pain and anxiety reducer.  It is an  Indica, but didn't make me too sleepy or cloudy.  Good for night time creativity.”
“mediocre, lasts long enough, sedative, lacking”
“My favorite medical skunky bud. Can't get enough of this!”
“Amazing!”

“This review is coming from my personal opinion after smoking 500 mg of blackwater in the form of a co2 distillate vape cartridge. In my opinion this gives the best flavor, which for me was fruity, more of a grape taste as listed above. This strain is potent and may be the perfect strain for chronic smokers who suffer from insomnia such as myself. After a restless night I grab this specific strain take a few large puf...”
“Signed up just drop some love for this strain. A+”

“Amazing strain. Dense thick buds that when ground produced mass amounts of kief. After buying 5 grams I accumulated 2.7 grams of kief and proceeded to smoke 3 kief blunts. Made me write and produce music freely and made everything on television hilarious”
“Fucking loved the strain”

“strain is by far the most potent fast hitting strain 
I have smoked and I have smoked a fair amount 
of different strains and if I could get this repeatedly I would. i also suffer from severe insomnia and I can feel it lurking me into a complete relaxation.”
“Just tried this strain for the first time on 08-27-2018, andblet me tell it's very good for anxiety and pain.”
“One of my favorite strains always calms me down after a hard day's work and helps me with my sever back and neck pain and helps me sleep at night it”

“This is by far my favorite strain for nighttime. About 20 minutes after use I was lying in bed and felt like I was levitating. I felt as if I was laying on clouds. Extremely relaxed and my sleep was amazing. Thank you to whomever created Black Water. That was my first time I was able to sleep all night in over 15 years.”

“First off the smell! The smell is incredible like nothing I had smelled before.

Secondly the buds are dark and dense. 

Third, the smoke. The smoke is very nice, didn't notice a certain taste or not, but it was smooth but you felt it hit your lungs.

Forth, the high  Relaxation station choo chop here I come.   Of all the smokes I've had this is a guaranteed relaxation and sleepy high. I love this, I'm searching ever...”

“Blackwater is definitely a strain to put you to sleep. A couple bowls of this rich Indica and you'll be fighting to make it to the bed before you crash. I would say handle with caution if you're a new smoker b/c of the potency of this stain. Overall the only negative is the cotton mouth that sets in but you can handle this pretty easily. Excellent strain for a Sunday afternoon.”
“Very nice and smooth.  Very nice inhale as well as exhale.   Definitely uplifting for my mood, and it helped with my back pain as well.  Very impressive strain.”
“One of My fav. Indicas! Realy relaxing Stoned and it smells so good”

“This is a powerful Indica that has dense and lovely medium sized buds with an earthy and sweet flavor. If you like to count sheep while dreaming then this is the strain for you as it'll send you packing when you’re ready to indulge. ***Blackwater by Gabriel in WA, THCA 20.96% CBD .15%. ***”
“I really enjoyed Blackwater, had a real hard time keeping my eyes closed after I was done smoking. Very tasty! Definitely one I will have to try again and again! Thank you Phoenix Relief Center!!”
“Highly Recommend”

“What can I say?  It is my first time ever vaping, therefore I am receiving this in concentrated form and not flower, mostly because I'll try anything once and it was a freebie for being a new patient!  

As for the vape?  Pretty cool, but I'm an old school smoker and I will always go to my flower first so that being said, I will likely purchase this in flower next time.  But that also being said because I didn't answ...”
“Incredible smoke! This little bud packs quite the punch. Grab a soda and a bag of Funions and find a place to sit because that's where you'll be for the next couple of hours.”
“damn u all are some funny mo fo's hahaha... got me some today and smoked it with some gsc shatter mixed in.... super baked and couch locked listening some tunes...”
“te pone relajado suelto y bien clavado, para un 4:20 muy rico ( te deja tirado)”
“This is a very good night time strain,  I love it.  I just gradually drift along before I make it to bed, where I float away to a deep slumber.”
“Great indica. Starts out nice and happ and then transitions into a full body stoned out sleep fest.  Great stuff”
“Exceptional. Berner, yes sir!!”
“Its the best i've had in Arizona this far”
“Put me out after two puffs. Solid nighttime medicine.”

“I must have had a bad batch from my licensed producer because blackwater was one of the worse strain I ever had.
The smell was very unpleasant; it reminded me of moss, dirt and mold and was quite strong. I actually looked closely for mold because the smell really grossed me out but no, that's just the way it was..

As for it's effect; it's an indica with a good level of THC so I was expecting to fall asleep pretty fa...”

“stoning rich herb flavor. long lasting high. has numbing effect : )
smooth flavor.”
“Great for nighttime.  Relaxed and sleepy.”
“Damn good strain, amazing for playing games”

“Worked immediately on my body pain suffer from fibro depression anxiety muscle spasms it all went away didn't even finish first bowl and I have a high tolerance being that I take rso as a muscle relaxer”

“My go-to strain for insomnia. Glad they always have it on the shelves at AZ Organix, because this little beauty knocks me straight to sleep even on the toughest nights. An all time favorite and total game changer.”
“Love”
“Great for going to sleep. Washes over you like a warm bath! Great and heavy started to fall over.”

“Took one bong rip of this last night before bed and before I realized it I was lying in bed but it felt like I was part of the bed. It was a very fun and melty high. If you have anything to do, don’t smoke this. If you want an amazing nights sleep, smoke up.”
“A smooth, easy smoke, with a strong after punch”

“I heard a lot of good reviews on this strain. So I decided to go to Arizona Organix to try their master kush. And let me tell you it is one of their best indicas hands down! I highly recommend checking them out!”
“nice bud taste. pretty strong high with indica100%”
“my favorite bud, firm and sticky, im an indica fan, one of the very best”
“A very good strain, perfect for getting to sleep and easing pain!”
“blackwater was definitely one of my top favorites. Getting that deep burning feeling in my chest while still have a relatively good fruity taste was amazing.”
“Great strain for late night activities like Netflix & chill.”

hours. If u have ish to do than don't smoke this. Definitely one of my favorite Indicas.”
“very tasty n strong”
“Great for pain. Been the only thing helping me through a broken rib.”
“Super tasty n a yummy pine taste...great taste n super stoney”
“Earthy with a bit of sweet. Powerfully sedating but gives a little energy. Good for winding down from partying.”
“Super tasty n a yummy pine taste...great taste n super stoney”
“Only one so far to help my chronic migraines immediately!”
“this strain is so tasty and the bud quality was just as all other reviews say so i decided to try and wow got couch locked after a few bowls this strain is a must if you. love indica”
“Earthy with a bit of sweet. Powerfully sedating but gives a little energy. Good for winding down from partying.”
“Very tasty! Stoney but not sleepy, got the most for the $!”
“I was looking forward to it but not as smooth or fruity as I had hoped. Great relaxation and sedation mix with an extended length of relief from pain or worries!”
“Helped me fall asleep and stay asleep going to keep a steady diet of black water  from now on!”
“Super quick onset, great mellow high, put me to sleep an hour after half a joint...”
“This one sucked, no noticeable high or benefit”

“Awesome one from Cali Con! Captures the musky grapes of Mendo, and brings the earth, pine and hints of fuel from the SFV. Love the color this had, it was a soft color of green almost tinted with silver, and shades of purple throughout. Pretty dense. This is the kind of stuff that expands in your lungs, and makes you cough oh so good. Effects were typical for OG with a bit of derpy couchlock mindfuzz from the Purps.”
“Very tasty! Stoney but not sleepy, got the most for the $!”
“Helped me fall asleep and stay asleep going to keep a steady diet of black water  from now on!”
“New favorite. So sleepy and relaxed.”

“Very good smoke...tastes nice and smooth, not everyone likes to choke! Relaxing and care reducing...about an hour before bed is the right for enjoying this indica, as it'll set you down and get you ready for some much needed slumber! Not for daytime use. but my fave at about 9:00...don't smoke too early tho, as it does come with a big case of the munchies! Heavy on the body, and just right for the head!”
“Super quick onset, great mellow high, put me to sleep an hour after half a joint...”
“Blackwater is one of those strains that can kick down your door unexpectedly if you're in the wrong mindset. Steady rise, but can occasionally kick you like a donkey.”

Excellent for pre-rolls.”
“One of my top ten favorites of all time. Love the look, flavor, smell, and a very nice relaxing movie med!!! Highly recommend to at least try!”

“First thing I noticed was how harsh it is on the back of the throat. Another user described it as a cannabis cigar and I completely agree. This strain is awesome for pain. I had shoulder surgery and wake up soar. I don't want to take medication that early in the morning so I smoked the black water and after about 10 minutes, I felt relief. It's super chill.”

“Finally a hard hitting indica that can slow my brain down somewhat. Insomnia is a bitch, but black water is good at taking them down. Great for chronic pain.

column4: really great for all I've got.”"

column3: “Very tasty strain. Great for inflammation/pain, anxiety, and insomnia, can be helpful for appetite as well. Pretty heavy Indica though so recommended for night... a more mellow indica heavy hybrid like Purple Urkel might be a good daytime option for something similar”

“Another Cali Connection strain. Black water crossed w/ og kush I believe. Very dark dense buds. Not a purple smell but a dank and musky earth scent, though there is a sweet tang to it. So dark it is black! Very sedating and medicating, sending u off to sleep w/ minimal pain.”
“Great strain for a variety smoke..Very colorful and sweet.”

“I read the review about this strain AFTER I vaporized a bowl of it. The reviews are spot on. Immediate euphoric/head effects. Within minutes crept down my body. Good thing I am sitting in the couch right now because I've lost. All motivation to move, but I'm in a great state of mind, all the days stress is gone and it feels like I might be drooling.”
“Great taste,  and really smooth smoke, with a sweet after taste. ...helps me sleep”
“Hard hitting indica that's very stony and relaxing. Nighttime strain for sure.”
“A great indica, really helps with my leg pain and very relaxing yet not heavy.”
“Exceptional quality and THC above 24%.”
“An absolute must have in your arsenal at all times! Great before bed due to super heavy high and the fact I can't keep my eyes open 😂”

“This strain makes you EXTREMELY aroused”

“Great overall but the taste is a little too earthy. I've had a kidney stone for the last week and this has helped both with the pain and with the nausea. One of the better strains I've had in a while. Nice buds that break up great and nice purple tone.”

“Love this strain! It gives a very quick acting head high, ease of anxiety, and an overall mellow/relaxed vibe. As it moves on, it really takes over from head to toe and pushes you into total bliss. Floating, weightless, works great on moderate-severe pain, insomnia. Amazing stuff. This strain is every nighttime mix I make. It's a top 5 for me!j”

“Pleasant effects!”

“I imagine this is the strain that Snoop Dogg reaches for when he wants to get stupid.

More... I can't.”
“Absolutely my top favorite. I do not let myself run out of this potent strain. A must try.”

“the pictures shown are only of the greenest hybrids grown I consider these to be false Blackwater more well known as Blackwater OG many times these days people seem to try and pass of the super Deepness of a pure and true Blackwater strain as an more dominant OG I have to say to you growers you trully must not have had the end product desired to all you patients out there it doesn't mean it wasn't good I'm sure it co...”

I like The texXture - how it's roundish nugs, covered with like golden orange somewhat look alike web hairs, with some sweet purple hues deep within, oh the ShmeLl of i...”
“That is good smoke!  Vapes like a beauty & somehow makes me 50 pounds heavier, yet light as a cloud. For a heavy body indica seeker, this killed my root canal pain & nausea.  Very impressed.”

“A personal favorite indica of mine! Very nice relaxing euphoric feeling.”
“Lung ripper ;) worth it for the pain relief”
“love”
“this strain was super stickyy and green and fat and fluffy and dense its just that bomb five star sh**”

“This is a beautiful strong strain it really is wonderful to just look at with all its crystals sparkling tricoms. I have to say it is nice and sticky and smells and taste great. If you have build up a tolerance give black water a try you'll love it.....”
“Yes! Finally something that gets me. Love blackwater on so many levels. I'm able to relax, stay focused and feel no pain.”
“Great strain. Heavy. Great for night time and pain relief. If procured correctly it will be grape/berry over pine and citrus undertones. Awesome strain.”
“sets me straight love the taste and feeling”
“My favorite Indica! I can't get enough of this grape and pine taste. It has a cloudy high with the potential couch lock. Great for pain and sleep”

“pjw121 swell has some really nice

“Definitely a strain you want to light at night time. 
Very heavy Classic Indica, well created.”
“Perfect for sleepy time-pain-chill-stress relief-stuffy head-so you can rest medicine.  In other words, the perfect Indica Flower”

“A quick hitting indica, I found myself feeling relaxed and happy. Warming of my face and especially my nose was welcome. Closing my eyes reveals beautiful images that can only be described as exquisite. 

Mild tasting, with a slight woodiness to it, it is an easy strain to vaporize. I'd buy it again.”

“Heavy hitting indica guaranteed to help you fall asleep & stay asleep. Wonderful almost fresh morning pine but with a pungent slimy odor. Excellent for increasing  appetite greatly. Long lasting & hard hitting. Dense buds with orangeish-amber hairs with varying shades of green. With the underbelly of the buds holding a dense collection of trichromes.”
“reminded me why I used to be an Indica girl <3 i'm in love”

“This review is coming from my personal opinion after smoking 500 mg of blackwater in the form of a co2 distillate vape cartridge. In my opinion this gives the best flavor, which for me was fruity, more of a grape taste as listed above. This strain is potent and may be the perfect strain for chronic smokers who suffer from insomnia such as myself. After a restless night I grab this specific strain take a few large puf...”

“We have been growing high quality medical for several years.We allways do extensive research before we do new strains".Read and heard a lot about Blackwater
column4: but was scared away by insanely high prices.Always preaching about genetics
column5: we chose to spend the insane amount for Blackwater seeds
column6: relying on Calli Connections genetic pool.We are extremely disappointed...Blackwater is not stabilized...produced 3 deferen. Type...”"

column3:
“very comfortable high like stilling in a hot tub while getting a back rub.
very smooth and tasty.
very positive vibe  i would deem this strain my top favorite.”
“It’s legit. Hits pretty smooth, nice level of relaxed. An over all awesome strain. Also, the grape/fruity smell kinda reminds me of a grape jolly rancher.”

“Just opening the pop top to reveal Blackwater OG’s round, pine green, fluffy little buds excited me, and should excite you too.  I’ve been fighting a cold all week and even my clogged nose could smell the earthy/berry blend wafting up through the holes of my grinder, even carried a bit of a woodsy scent for good measure.  Blackwater’s sweet berry flavor intensifies in the first drags and you don’t need much from this...”
“Seems like a bloodline of King Louis... taste is plain and smooth, burn is great, potency is good, looks are excellent.  A shell of warmth and goodness wraps around you.”
“Picked up an eighth in Colorado on vacation from Seed and Smith. One of the best I sampled. Helped with back pain, muscle spasms and insomnia, wouldn't hesitate to get this again.”

“This is a powerful Indica that has dense and lovely medium sized buds with an earthy and sweet flavor. If you like to count sheep while dreaming then this is the strain for you as it'll send you packing when you’re ready to indulge. ***Blackwater by Gabriel in WA, THCA 20.96% CBD .15%. ***”

“Blackwater is definitely a strain to put you to sleep. A couple bowls of this rich Indica and you'll be fighting to make it to the bed before you crash. I would say handle with caution if you're a new smoker b/c of the potency of this stain. Overall the only negative is the cotton mouth that sets in but you can handle this pretty easily. Excellent strain for a Sunday afternoon.”

“First off the smell! The smell is incredible like nothing I had smelled before.

Secondly the buds are dark and dense. 

Third, the smoke. The smoke is very nice, didn't notice a certain taste or not, but it was smooth but you felt it hit your lungs.

Forth, the high  Relaxation station choo chop here I come.   Of all the smokes I've had this is a guaranteed relaxation and sleepy high. I love this, I'm searching ever...”

“This is by far my favorite strain for nighttime. About 20 minutes after use I was lying in bed and felt like I was levitating. I felt as if I was laying on clouds. Extremely relaxed and my sleep was amazing. Thank you to whomever created Black Water. That was my first time I was able to sleep all night in over 15 years.”

“strain is by far the most potent fast hitting strain 
I have smoked and I have smoked a fair amount 
of different strains and if I could get this repeatedly I would. i also suffer from severe insomnia and I can feel it lurking me into a complete relaxation.”
“Fucking loved the strain”
“Signed up just drop some love for this strain. A+”
“Amazing!”
“My favorite medical skunky bud. Can't get enough of this!”

“Amazing strain. Dense thick buds that when ground produced mass amounts of kief. After buying 5 grams I accumulated 2.7 grams of kief and proceeded to smoke 3 kief blunts. Made me write and produce music freely and made everything on television hilarious”
“Makes me feel relaxed and not exactly hungry if I don't think about it”
“Smoked as budder from Green Leaf, Denver. Deeee-licious!”
“Great for pain instant numb”
“Rapid heartbeat, so not a fan. But I was definitely stoned for a bit mixed with anxiety. Then major munchies. not a super long lasting high.”
“this has been my go to indicate for the last few on the great taste, beautiful buds and potent without putting you to sleep immediatley”
“Fantastic mellow onset heavy indica strain. Sweet and berry-like​ in flavor. Recommended.”

sweet , pungent smell. 
smooth.”

“love this earthy strain!!! n its very strong so don't smoke if you are going somewhere lol”

“This was my first grow, and first to flower out of 12 plants.  Short and bushy compared to Herijuana and the King's Kush.  Yielded about 1.7 ounces dry.  About 8 weeks to flower for me.  Wow, took two hits and this put me down for the night.  Travels the whole body; definately an indica dried and cured at the right times.  Effects lasting for around 4 to 5 hours.”
“Nice Light high but very bad cotton mouth”

“I rellay enjoyed this strain. From what I was told it was suppoused to be a great strain for sleeping....it made me want to dance! But I loved it!
It was relaxing yet fun. 
It did gave me intense munchies though!”
“This one was dry. Taste good.  Helped me to sleep.”
“I heard this is good for anxiety but it wasn't. Gave a terrible body high, made my face feel totally uncomfy like tingly but not a good tingly. Blue dream is good for my anxiety or bubba kush.”
“Amazed pure dank”

“It gets you super relaxed and keeps you right above the sleepy threshold, but you can easily knock out if there's a lack of willpower to stay up. Overall it's a great evening high, coupled with a nice comedy movie and you'll be set in good spirit for the night!”
“Personal favorite at this point, and I'm a cannabis carnivore, Indica enthusiast. This strain is the truth.”
“Loved the way it makes me feel after a few hits. Best one I've come across yet!”
“Awesome bud! Smoke with caution though because it will absolutely deplete your productivity level! Takes away my anxiety while slamming me to the couch”

“Couch-locked amazingness!  Felt super relaxed after my second hit from my Pax.  My tooth doesn't hurt, my back doesn't hurt, my nerves aren't in battle, I can breathe very well, don't feel any anxiety, no nausea, and my muscles feel like jello - eating and relaxing is great right now.  Everything tastes amazing.  Definitely getting more!”

“It smells different to me, not the greatest. That being said, I can over look that fact. The buds are really big, fluffy, and almost look like they've been dipped in a sugary dust. 

My anxiety went away after smoking smoking this strain. I'd recommend this for people want a strong body high and dont have much planned for the day lol.”

“this strain kicks some ass.very good smoke!nice thick medium size,sticky buds.a sweet flavor and smell and i can smell lemon and pine.it hits pretty quick and is definitely a night time or stay at home all day and get stoned kinda smoke.good f/ pain,insomnia,just about damn near everything.i hurt nowhere and was very relaxed and high after 1/2 a joint.will definitely get again.if u like a good couchlock this is a goo...”
“it turned me into a potato couch and is perfect for winding down before bed.”
“The most relaxed feeling I have ever had! Definitely for the evening.  If it doesn't put you to sleep, you at least feel super relaxed.  kept me asleep for a full 8 hrs. very good for insomnia.”
“calming, kills pain but doesn't mess with head”
“Super super stong but Im a light weight.  Can't always find at my favorite store, but stock up when I can. One of my top 5. Great Indica that puts me to sleep”

“This is a really good strain. Very strong and on the indica side for me. Helped a lot with nerve pain, stress, anxiety and insomnia. A few bowls in the evening and I finally got the relief I needed. This is in my top 5 and a certain buy again. Oh the buds where light like green and very frosty. They had a diesel smell with orange hairs.”

“Excellent Indica All Around!!!! a I got it as a shatter from AZ Organix and it's super clear and golden & full of terps!  More so and end of the night Indica unless you are more of a novice daytime Indica smoked As I am. Very relaxing, relieves stress & anxiety excellently!  Another strain that is good to keep in the medicine cabinet hehe. 5*stars* all around for its huge variety of medical benifits as well as a grea...”
“Love how it relaxes me and takes away the pain that I am feeling. Definitely take at night for a great nights rest.”

“Finally a hard hitting indica that can slow my brain down somewhat. Insomnia is a bitch, but black water is good at taking them down. Great for chronic pain. 

No lie, I opened my grinder putting a few buds in there for the first time and thought my son shit his pants. It was the weed”
